multiSpace: You are participating in more than one workspace. Please select one of them for authentication

errors.notVerified: Your user has not been verified. Please check your email to confirm your login details. account.
errors.badCredentials: You entered an incorrect username or password.
errors.lockAccount: Your account has been locked or deleted. Please contact an administrator
errors.duplicatedUser: The email address you entered is already in use. Already have an account? Try resetting your password
errors.duplicatedCI: The ID you entered is already in use. Already have an account? Try resetting your password
errors.passwordHistory: You have already used this password before. Please try a new one

acceptTerms: I agree to the <terms><small>terms and conditions</small></terms>
forgetPasswordDescription: Please enter an email where we can send you a link with instructions to reset your password.
successSignUp: <alert>You have been successfully registered</alert>We have sent an email with verification instructions to <bold>{{email}}</bold>. Please check your email and follow the instructions.<brake></brake> If you have not received an email from us within 15 minutes, please check your SPAM folder. If there is still no email, click here to resend it.

confirmation.title: Verification
confirmation.errorCheckSubtext: This can happen if you clicked on the link we sent you after successfully logging into your account, the link has expired, or the URL is incorrect.
confirmation.errorUserNotFountOrVerified: User does not exist or is already verified
confirmation.newLink: Please enter the email address you registered with, a new verification link will be provided
confirmation.emailResend: Another email has been sent with instructions

recovery.helpText: Please enter an email address where we can send you a link with instructions to reset your password.
recovery.newPasswordHelpText: Please enter a password that is difficult to guess and contains at least 6 characters. Do not use one of your last passwords.
recovery.sentSubtext: If <bold>{{email}}</bold> is associated with an existing account, you will receive an email with instructions to reset your password.<brake></brake> If you have not received an email from us within 15 minutes, please check your <bold>SPAM</bold> folder. If there is still no email, click here to try again.
recovery.errorCheckSubtext: This can happen if you opened a link that you already used to successfully change your password, the link has expired, or the URL is incorrect.
recovery.passwordChanged: Your password has been successfully updated.
